title: Pull Weekly Performance Report
description: An analyst needs to compile the weekly performance report for a key client, pulling data from multiple ad platforms.

tasks.description: Retrieve performance data (spend, impressions, clicks, conversions) from Google Ads for the last 7 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the correct data from the Google Ads API.

tasks.description: Retrieve performance data from Facebook Ads for the last 7 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the correct data from the Facebook Ads API.

tasks.description: Consolidate the data into a standardized report template, calculating overall metrics like total spend and cost-per-conversion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a single, accurate report with all data correctly consolidated.
